thread.title: Apple stores to launch with full global assortment
thread.title_full: Apple stores to launch with full global assortment

title: Apple stores to launch with full global assortment
text:
Apple stores to launch with 'full global assortment' 
Gulf News Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Angela Ahrendts, senior vice president of retail and online stores at Apple, talks to Gulf News about what to expect at the opening of the UAE's Apple stores...
